content: Phase 1 POC: Get integration playbooks (OpenAI primary, Anthropic fallback) and retrieve Emergent LLM key
Phase 1 POC: Set up tri-database architecture (MongoDB + PostgreSQL + Redis connections)
Phase 1 POC: Define canonical JSON schemas for all 9 agents (orchestrator, legal, cfp, writer, audit, etc.)
Phase 1 POC: Implement FastAPI routers for all 9 agents with deterministic stubs
Phase 1 POC: Build LegalAI deterministic rules engine (FDCPA/FCRA/CROA/SoL table)
Phase 1 POC: Build CFP-AI deterministic math engine (amortization, payoff, checksum)
Phase 1 POC: Implement AuditAgent provenance tracking with immutable logs
Phase 1 POC: Create test_core.py script covering orchestration pipeline end-to-end
Phase 1 POC: Run tests and fix until all pass (deterministic hashes, validation gates)
Phase 1 POC: Capture artifacts and verify all user stories work
